result.name: evaluation-of-the-troubled-families-programme
result.notes: Set of files containing individual level data on outcomes associated with the Troubled Families Programme (2012 to 2015). The data is part of a national evaluation of the Troubled Families Programme and will be used to inform the Troubled Families Team of the impact of the policy

organization.name: department-for-communities-and-local-government
organization.title: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
organization.description:
The Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government's (formerly the Department for Communities and Local Government) job is to create great places to live and work, and to give more power to local people to shape what happens in their area.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-housing-communities-and-local-government

result.title: Evaluation of the Troubled Families Programme

extras.value: The data will be provided by Government Departments directly to the contractor. DCLG have requested that the contractor provide us with anonymised extracts of the data for further analysis and the plan is to make the data suitable for publishing on the national data archive
